fastwork_guarantee_subtitle: Hiring freelancer through Fastwork platform gain every steps protection.
fastwork_guarantee_subsubtitle: End to end from starting to quality work delivery.
verified_freelancers_description: Standard verification for ID card, contact information, and portfolio
money_back_title: Guarantee money back in case no delivery
money_back_description: With escrow money protection system, money will be transferred to freelancer only when the final delivery is approved. Guarantee work delivery
support_team_title: Support team ready to serve customer and freelancer
support_team_description: Dispute and support team is ready to help in case of conflict. Investigate and judge the case fairly for both customer and freelancer
terms_conditions_title: Terms and condition for Guarantee program. More confident in hiring.
protection_case1: Freelancer doesn't comply with contract described in quotation
protection_case2: The final work doesn't qualify as freelancer advertised in the product or by agreement
protection_case3: Freelancer disappear or cannot be contact
protection_case4: Final has not been manually approved or auto approved in the Fastwork Platform
end_protection_case1: Customer violate hiring contract described in quotation
end_protection_case2: Customer didn't hire and payment through the Fastwork Platform
end_protection_case3: Final has been manually approved or auto approved in the Fastwork Platform
tell_us_more_description: Additional feedback can be done after the final work has been approved. Contact customer support when you found the hiring problem or would like to give suggestion for improvement.
confident_hiring_title: Confident in hiring with Fastwork. Freedom to choose to accept final work or request money back.
review_process_question: How to give review after approved the final work?
dispute_process_question: For the non-approved work, how to initiate the dispute
step1_description: Click button "Evaluate" in the bottom of the chat screen after you approved the final work. The evaluation form will be displayed.
step2_title: 2. Evaluate by giving score and comment regarding the final work
step2_description: Evaluate skill, quality, satisfaction, and comments to freelancer's work. This will be valuable information to other customer. The information in the first review page will be accumulative and display to freelance profile and product.
step3_description: Let us know your expectation with freelancer's work and service quality. No one will be able to access this secret review except key person at Fastwork. This is critical for us to improve quality of our freelancer to serve you to the most satisfaction.
step4_title: 4. Give a score of how much would you like to recommend Fastwork to others
step4_description: You can share us the issue or problem you found while using the platform. You can also give comments and suggestions to the Fastwork team. We value all of your feedback and take it seriously for improvement.
customer_support_description: Your problem is our priority. You can contact our customer support by the following channels.
customer_support_working_hours: Our team is ready to serve you every day, Monday-Friday from 9:30 - 22:00
start_hiring_title: Start hiring today with ultimate protection
